name: Ethereal Hunger
description:
A small 3D game made in 5 days for the Interstellar Game Jam 4. It's made entirely in raymarching and it's very short.

It might take a minute to load, so don't worry if you just have black screen with music playing at the start.

The theme of the jam was "Another Dimension" so I decided to go for something as otherworldly as possible, visually speaking.

There are a lot of things I didn't get time to finish or polish like the map not having physical limits are that damn cursor still showing... Also, the enemy AI isn't great.

Controls :

WASD to move

Mouse to attack nearby enemies (if they're weaker than you)

R to restart (if all enemies remaining are stronger than you, you can't win)

Note : the enemies' placement and relative strength are randomized at the start. So you might get a bit easier or harder playthrough each time.

It is a bit performance heavy, I recommend playing it with Google Chrome. I made a gameplay video just in case :
